general.department: We serve in diffrent departments like cardiology, neurology, pediatrics.
general.hospital: Welcome to CityCare Hospital. We are here to help you 24/7.
general.location: We are located at 123 Health Avenue, Wellness City.
general.emergency: Emergency services are available 24/7. Dial 102 for ambulance.

cardiology.intro: Cardiology deals with heart-related treatments and surgeries.
cardiology.services: We offer ECG, angiography, angioplasty, and heart surgery.
cardiology.doctors: Dr. Smith and Dr. Patel are our leading cardiologists.
cardiology.timings: Cardiology department is open from 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Saturday.

neurology.intro: Neurology treats brain, spinal cord, and nervous system disorders.
neurology.services: MRI, EEG, stroke rehabilitation, and neurological consultations.
neurology.doctors: Dr. Neha Sharma and Dr. Rakesh Jain are our neurology experts.
neurology.timings: Neurology is available from 10 AM to 4 PM, Monday to Friday.

pediatrics.intro: Pediatrics focuses on medical care for infants and children.
pediatrics.services: Vaccinations, child wellness checkups, and nutritional advice.
pediatrics.doctors: Dr. Anjali Mehra is our senior pediatrician.
pediatrics.timings: Pediatrics is available from 9 AM to 1 PM, Monday to Saturday.
